objects.text:

• 6 GB RAM
• Dual Camera System

product_details.name: Apple iPhone 15 (128 GB) - Green
product_details.description: OS: iOS. RAM: 6 GB. Product Dimensions: 0.78 x 7.16 x 14.76 cm; 171 g. Batteries: 1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included). Wireless communication technologies: Bluetooth, Wi-Fi. Connectivity technologies: Wi‑Fi 6 (802.11ax) with 2x2 MIMO;Bluetooth 5.3. Special features: USB, Camera. Other display features: Wireless. Other camera features: Front. Form factor: Bar. Colour: Green. Battery Power Rating: 0.02 Kilovolts. Whats in the box: iPhone 15 1N, USB-C Charge Cable. Country of Origin: China. Item Weight: 171 g. Importer: (If applicable) Apple India Private Limited No.24, 19th floor, Concorde Tower C, UB City, Vittal Mallya Road, Bangalore - 560 001. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 8 x 72 x 148 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2 Count. Generic Name: iPhone 15.

banner_details:
The banner features a promotional layout with a bold and futuristic appeal, designed to draw attention to a special mobile offer. At the top, two stacked headline text layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) use a digital-style font—one in white and the other in a vibrant green—to highlight an exclusive deal. Below this, `subheading` introduces the product, followed by a concise product description (`description`) in a clean white font. The price is prominently featured in bold green (`price`), and a standout call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`) urges purchase. A sleek smartphone image (`product_image`) is positioned on the right. The background (`background`) showcases diagonal gradients and geometric overlays for depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Green: #0a3d1b
- Forest Green: #115c2a
- Leaf Green: #156b32
- Light Mint Green: #8ce78c
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image features a fresh and modern color palette dominated by soft pastel green and white tones. The primary hue is a mint green (#DFF5E3) used on the phone’s back panel, creating a clean and soothing aesthetic. The screen design blends vibrant lime green (#A3E635) and subtle translucent white (#F5F5F5), with gentle gradients that evoke modernity and clarity. The black border around the screen (#121212) provides contrast and highlights the screen display. These colors are harmoniously blended, contrasting vibrancy against minimalism. This palette is ideal for an advertisement banner to reflect elegance, futuristic design, and environmental freshness.
